## Slide with R Output

```{r cars, echo = TRUE}
library(leaflet)
df<- data.frame(lat=runif(20,min=	121.5,max=122),
                lng=runif(20,min=	30.7,max=31))
df%>%
leaflet()%>%
addTiles()%>%
addCircleMarkers()
```
